participant_abstract.sent: After a brief introduction to each other and the gadgets (with some minor teething problems with the latter) the aims of the project were discussed.
The aim is to develop a modern, trendy, user-friendly TV remote, and some consumer opinions were given by market research.

participant_actions.sent: Project manager - write up minutes, prepare next meeting (?).
Market research - browse web for customer opinion.
User interface designer - consider ways to make user friendly and trendy device.

participant_decisions.sent: stick to TV remote - no mulit-functional devices.
Try to make less complicated - limit number of buttons if possible.

participant_problems.sent: Idea of having mobile remote that responds to sound and moves so you don't have to get up - maybe too ambitous.
